content.raw:
@dihm In the meantime, you can add shots to the queue manually by dragging and dropping them onto the filelist :)

As for the memory profiler, I believe it works, it just dumps the output to a text file in the BLACS directory I think. To operate:
* Click "reset profiler".
* Do whatever it is you think might leak memory
* Click "garbage collect"
* Click "Diff memory usage"

You should then get a text file output containing a list of objects that have either been created or deleted since the profiler was started that were not garbage collected.
content.html:
@dihm In the meantime, you can add shots to the queue manually by dragging and dropping them onto the filelist :)

As for the memory profiler, I believe it works, it just dumps the output to a text file in the BLACS directory I think. To operate: Click "reset profiler". Do whatever it is you think might leak memory Click "garbage collect" Click "Diff memory usage"

You should then get a text file output containing a list of objects that have either been created or deleted since the profiler was started that were not garbage collected.
